item.title: Reponsive Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Purify Looks Wonderful On All Screen Sizes Because It’s Responsive

Built with elements from the mobile first Bootstrap 3 framework, Purify can automatically adapt to the screens sizes of most popular mobile devices like tablets and smart phones/ You can try resizing your browser window now to see how it will adapt. Other elements included for Purify such as Revolution Slider or Parallax Layers are also fully responsive, and the smartly clean and modern design is kept all the way down to the smallest screen sizes, like with iPhones. Our Menu are also collapsible when switching to small screen sizes to give other content more display spaces, especially the Main Menu which will automatically turns into an Off Canvas one when the screen size reaches a limit.

item.title: Retina Ready
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Purify will remain gorgeous on any screen

With a modern and clean design, vectored decorating icons an sharp retina graphics, Purify will remain a stunning look on all Retina and High-Resolution screens with super high pixel density, making a real step forward to ideas of future design.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Setup WooCommerce Shop Instantly with Purify

Purify is Fully compatible with WooCommerce. We also make the theme with stunning WooCommerce integrated design and custom widget to present WooCommerce products. There is even a premium plugin that especially works with WooCommerce included with the theme. Purify also inherits so many advanced features that are especially designed for e-commerce websites.

item.title: Custom Widgets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
More Custom and Tweaked Widget

The flexibility of Montana is ensured by using widgets that you can easily drag and drop and have many customizing options. We also customized some WooCommerce widgets to optimize product display and make it more suitable for Montana shops. All these widgets are integrated with Visual Composer so you can pull them out to construct pages easily.

item.title: One Click Demo Content
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Set up a page exactly like our Demo Website with just One Click

Clients with limited experiences on WordPress and websites in general can rest assured, there would be no more fussing about XML files import with the danger of your website being turned into a mess because of the missing content. We have an Importer that will set up your page exactly like our Demo Website with only One Click. Just by clicking a small button, all our demo pages, posts, sliders, widgets, menus, theme options and other settings will automatically be imported into your website in a very short time. Not only does it help under experienced clients to setup their website fast and efficiently, this feature also saves a lot of time that otherwise would need to be invested in configuration to use all of Montana features in full fledged. Our demo content contain a large number of pages and posts, numerous blogs, portfolio, testimonial and resume pages, shop home pages, archive pages in numerous layouts,etc… Most of them are empowered by shortcodes. Just imagine how they would appear in your site like magic in just a few minutes.

item.title: Multilingual Ready
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Purify is Ready to be Tranlated

Purify is WPML compatible, qTranslate compatible and has RTL built-in and can be translated to any language fast and smoothly. Whether it’s localizing or internationalizing you want, you can always do it “the WordPress way” with Montana.

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Showcase Your Customer Reviews

With Montana Testimonial post type, you can easily show how pleased and happy your customers are with their reviews and testimonials. It is the perfect way to show off the high quality of your product or your service, and therefor would play a role in making your business bloom. You can choose to show any number of these Testimonials in sophisticated slideshows with various layout options on any of your pages and posts with Montana Testimonial Shortcode

item.title: Font Awesome Icons
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
All Font Awesome Icons Integrated

The entire Font Awesome Icon Set is fully integrated with Montana. You can use all of these beautiful and scalable icons to decorate your site and you can customize them with size, color, drop shadow, like anything you can do with text.

a:3:{s:7:"widgets";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"type";s:6:"visual";s:5:"title";s:44:"Setup WooCommerce Shop Instantly with Purify";s:4:"text";s:548:"

Purify is Fully compatible with WooCommerce. We also make the theme with stunning WooCommerce integrated design and custom shortcodes to present WooCommerce products. There is even a premium plugin that especially works with WooCommerce included with the theme: the Woocommerce Sales Countdown plugin that count the remaining time till the end or the beginning of a sale period, which would cost $14 when purchased separately.

Purify also inherits so many advanced features that are especially designed for e-commerce websites.

item.title: Powerful Admin Panel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Purify features a very Powerful Theme Options Panel

Included in this Panel are options to customize just any part of your website. It allows you to style almost any element of the site to your liking by changing colors or select any of the 500+ beautiful Google fonts for your Headings and Body text. You can also change background colors or upload pictures to use as background patterns or background images for some elements on your website. The side of some elements can also be set with options from this Panel. Users can design their shops in any style and make their Aloma e-commerce stores look completely different even when they are built from the same basic WordPress theme. Some advanced features that you don’t want to use can also be turned on or off with this Theme Options Panel. Layouts for Archives as well as Excerpt Length for your Blog posts are also turned into easily customized options for you to control on this single advanced panel. It also grant you the control on which element from the Archive Meta Information you want to show your visitors.

item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: OXO Good Grips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Set includes: Large Brush and Small Brush with wiper blade
  • Soft, comfortable, non-slip grips with durable scrubbing bristles
  • Large Brush is great for grout, shower door tracks, stove tops and more.
item.excerpt:encoded: Brushes feature ergonomically-designed handles with durable, non-abrasive bristles. Perfectly designed for all of you CONTIGO cleaning needs.

item.title: Household Scrub Brush
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• 3-Piece set is compatible with all CONTIGO travel mugs, water bottles and kids cups

item.title: Aenean aliquet mi ligula
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Shoes of Prey is a global online retail brand that allows women (including Carly Rae Jepsen!) to design their own shoes which we hand-make and deliver to them. We’re changing the way women shop for shoes and we’re on track to become a significant international retailer within the next 5 years. As our business continues to grow we're looking for a passionate Marketing and Product Management Intern to assist Todd, our Senior Product Manager improving our website conversion rate whilst also managing and propelling forward the Shoes of Prey presence in the French market. Shoes of Prey has created one of the best shoe design experiences on the internet. With such a bright group of engineers, creatives and marketing specialists behind this website, there is much you can learn from an internship with us! Shoes of Prey internships are full-time and based in Sydney, Australia.

• Dissolves soap scum, calcium deposits and limescale
  • Powerful foam reduces scrubbing
  • Removes hard water stains
  • Leaves no residue after rinsing
item.excerpt:encoded: The non-toxic, biodegradable formula is safe to use around children and pets. Cleans floors, carpets, walls, appliances, sinks and drains, greasy tools and more.

item.title: Bath Cleaning Kit
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Shower Tub and Tile for use on acrylic, fiberglass, ceramic tiles, porcelain, laminate and Corian
  • Acidic toilet bowl is safe for septic tanks, drain lines and water treatment systems
  • Glass cleaner leaves a streak-free shine on mirrors and chrome
  • All Purpose works well on countertops, tile, porcelain and painted surfaces
  • All products 32 oz.
item.excerpt:encoded: The non-toxic, biodegradable formula is safe to use around children and pets. Cleans floors, carpets, walls, appliances, sinks and drains, greasy tools and more.

item.title: Liquid Hand Soap
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Liquid hand soap
  • Dermatologist-tested formula to clean hands with a gentle touch that is less drying than ordinary soap
  • Pump-handle for convenient dispensing
  • Aloe vera scent
item.excerpt:encoded: The non-toxic, biodegradable formula is safe to use around children and pets. Cleans floors, carpets, walls, appliances, sinks and drains, greasy tools and more.

item.title: Hand Sanitizer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Kills 99.9% of harmful germs
  • Formula moisturizes with Aloe and Vitamin E
  • Cleans hands and kills germs without water
  • Easy size to take along where every you go

item.title: Touch Free Dispenser
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Touch-free, trouble-free dispensing system
  • Automatically dispenses perfect amount of foam or gel sanitizer needed
  • Features a skylight with an extra large site window that makes it easy to see when it’s time to refill
  • 30,000 uses from three standard C-size alkaline batteries (Not Included)
item.excerpt:encoded: The non-toxic, biodegradable formula is safe to use around children and pets. Cleans floors, carpets, walls, appliances, sinks and drains, greasy tools and more.
